filter(HttpServletRequest) - Method in class de.db.derpate.servlet.filter.CSRFServletFilter
Checks (and invalidates, if necessary) a CSRF token provided by a header or parameter in the HttpServletRequest.
filter(HttpServletRequest) - Method in class de.db.derpate.servlet.filter.LoginServletFilter
Method used by the FilterServlet to make sure, a servlet only gets used by a logged in user and the correct Usermode (if it was set by constructor).
If no usermode was set, all logged in users are allowed.

FilterServlet - Class in de.db.derpate.servlet
This abstract class extends the BaseServlet and expects ServletFilters (constructor), that check, if the request is valid (for example, if the user is logged in).
Use BaseServlet instead, if a servlet should be publicly available without any restriction.
FilterServlet(ServletFilter...) - Constructor for class de.db.derpate.servlet.FilterServlet
Constructor, that expects ServletFilters, that get stored and used later, when handling a request
